Text: A Brilliant Genocide is a 2016 documentary film produced by Atlantic Star Productions.
Triplets:<A Brilliant Genocide
1:
--------------------
Text: A Brilliant Genocide:  The purpose of the film is to reveal atrocities committed against the Acholi people by the Government of Uganda, and its President Yoweri Museveni, under the guise of crushing a rebellion by Joseph Kony's Lord's Resistance Army (LRA).
Triplets:<Yoweri Museveni
2:
--------------------
Text: A Brilliant Genocide:  The film is a counterpoint to the 2012 documentary short film "Kony 2012".
Triplets:<A Brilliant Genocide
